title: Mario Monicelli -  Un Borghese Piccolo Piccolo (1977)
description:
Giovanni Vivaldi (Alberto Sordi) doesn&#039;t have many ambitions in life. As far as he is concerned, things are pretty good just as they are. He has a wonderful son, whom he is grooming for a place in the civil service, and a weekend hideaway which he loves fixing up. His wife Amalia (Shelly Winters) is also a happy sort, and she adores their son. However, when the boy, an innocent bystander, is killed by some bank robbers, Giovanni&#039;s fuse is finally lit. Soon he is consumed by the need to get revenge.
